active.content:
Subject: Quick question about potential state-held funds for [Company Legal Name]

Hi [FirstName],

I work with companies to identify state-held unclaimed funds (old credits, refunds, dormant accounts) that appear under their name in state databases and often go unnoticed.

A preliminary check suggests there may be items reported under [Company Legal Name] in [State]'s unclaimed property records. You can always claim directly with the state, or I can help organize and track the recovery if you prefer support.

If this is worth a look, I can send a short summary of what I'm seeing and what the recovery steps would be so you can decide if it's worth pursuing. If someone else on your team (finance / accounting) is a better contact, I'm happy to reach out to them instead.

Best,
[Profile First Name]
Load Router – Unclaimed Property Recovery

dissolved.content:
Subject: Possible state-held funds related to [Company Legal Name]

Hi [FirstName],

If this is something you'd want to tidy up, I can send a short summary of what I'm seeing and the steps a former owner/officer can take to recover anything that belongs to the company or its stakeholders, including filing directly with the state if you prefer.

If you're no longer the right contact, I'm happy to reach out to whoever handled the wind-down or finances instead.

Best,
[Profile First Name]
Load Router – Unclaimed Property Recovery

acquired.content:
Subject: Possible state-held funds tied to [New Entity Name] & legacy entities

Hi [FirstName],

I work with companies to locate state-held unclaimed funds not only under their current name, but also under prior names and acquired entities that sometimes remain in state records after mergers or name changes.

In reviewing [State]'s data, it appears that [Company Legal Name] / [New Entity Name] may have items still sitting with the state under a legacy record. As the successor, [New Entity Name] would generally be in position to recover those funds.

If this is worth a quick look, I can send a short summary of what I'm seeing and outline the recovery steps so you can decide if it's worth pursuing. If someone else in treasury/finance is a better contact, I'm happy to reach out to them instead.

Best,
[Profile First Name]
Load Router – Unclaimed Property Recovery
